content: **skill level** intermediate **finished sizes** to fit bust circumference 28 34 40 46 54 60 66 72 **finished measurements** back length 16 5 16 5 17 17 75 18 18 25 18 75 18 75 waist circumference 42 5 48 54 5 60 68 73 5 79 85 **gauge** 20 sts & 26 row = 4 in garter st after steam blocking take time to check gauge **materials** trinity cashmere /yarns/library/yarn-citizen-trinity-cashmere lace weight 49% super baby alpaca 39% mulberry silk 12% cashmere 247 yds / 25g per ball 3 3 4 4 5 5 6 6 balls shown in icicle **needles ** us size 8 5 mm 36 circular needle **notions ** tapestry needle **pattern notes** top is knit in one piece back-and-forth from the front to the back it s finished by seaming under the sleeves and along the side of the body please use our color-coding for your convenience instructions are written for the smallest size in black with instructions to fit bust sizes 34-46 in blue and to fit bust sizes 54-72 in pink if only one instruction is given it should be worked for all sizes
